We just test the client-side, i.e. the methods of the remote interface.
Thu=
s you dont have to deploy anything differently. 
The only thing necessary w=
ith weblogic is, one should use the 
-noloading option when running tests.
=

junit.swingui.TestRunner.main(
	new String[] { yourTest.class.getName(), "=
-noloading" } );

or use the textui.TestRunner


- Lucas
